text: , son of Tsunehira, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Kamakura period (1185–1333). He held a regent position kampaku from 1337 to 1338. With a daughter of sangi Fujii Tsuguzane he had a son Michitsugu. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1305 births Category:1354 deaths
title: Konoe Mototsugu
